channel.title: How do I add an NPC?
channel.description:
Hi, how do I add a NPC on my server, for example I know how to add an item in class8.java for example the code:
[code]if(i == 229){[/code]
Under
[code] class8.anInt157 = i; class8.method197(); class8.method203(true, aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_183);[/code]
But how with a npc? Please help me!
~Armo :)

item.title: How do I add an NPC?
item.dc:creator: @dragonchain dragonchain
item.description:
@dragonchain wrote:

Dude, you have no idea what your talking about, and this is about a client… and models, and you don’t know anything what I am talking about it so don’t even post.

item.title: How do I add an NPC?
item.dc:creator: @shiniy shiniy
item.description:
@shiniy wrote:

ALL U HAVE TO DO IS GO TO CFG AND LOOK UNDER OUTOSPAWM.CFG THEN U ADD IT CHOOSE NPC U WANT AND THE PLACE U WANT TO BE THEN U GO TO NPCHANDELER.JAVA I THINK AFTER THAT ADD ALMOST SAME THING LIKE THE OTHEIR NPC AND ADDED WAT U WANTTEM TO SAIY
